translations: adj.无尾的；无财产继承之限制的

phrs.translation: 无尾的, 律, 无水平尾翼的
无尾飞机, 无尾翼航空器, 无尾翼飞机, 无尾飞行器

sentences.sentence: One of the more notable features of the X-4 Bantam, built by Northrop, was its semi-tailless design.
sentences.translation: 对在X - 4更突出的特点班特姆由诺斯罗普建成，一，是它的半尾巴设计。

sentences.sentence: For straight - winged tailless airplanes, only the negative camber satisfies the conditions for flight.
sentences.translation: 对直机翼无尾飞机，只有负弯度才满足飞行条件。
